pullRequest.title: Use auto-generated names for registries
pullRequest.bodyText:
These names can be auto-generated from the create() calls that they are initialized with. Note that there are some changes compared to the previous Yarn names, like BLOCK_ENTITY -> BLOCK_ENTITY_TYPE.
Three of the original names are left in this PR. REGISTRIES can't be automapped, and CONTAINER and STATUS_EFFECT differ from the Yarn names of those concepts.

nodes.bodyText: What is this one now called?

commit.message: Add back manual names for Registry.MENU and Registry.MOB_EFFECT
